name: gemini-assistant
title: Gemini Assistant
description: Gemini Assistant is a versatile extension for Raycast that harnesses the power of Google's Gemini API to enhance your productivity. Whether you need automated code reviews, intelligent suggestions, or quick answers to complex questions, Gemini Assistant is your go-to tool for AI-driven insights and support. The extension operates for free using your own Gemini API key, ensuring seamless integration and cost-effective usage.
author: dorian_frances

preferences.name: geminiApiKey
preferences.title: Gemini API Key
preferences.description: Enter your Gemini API key to enable code reviews.

commands.name: review-my-code
commands.title: Review My Code
commands.subtitle: Get instant, AI-driven code feedback with Gemini
commands.description: The Automated Code Review command utilizes Google's Gemini API to analyze your code and provide detailed feedback. It highlights syntax errors, suggests best practices, and offers optimization tips to improve code quality and maintainability.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
